definition: an earthwork/castle/position of defense/stronghold/used in place names, often as phonetic bao for "burg" or "bad"
variant of 鋪|铺[pu4]/used in place names

sentences.english: The children build sandcastles on the beach.
In theory, it is possible to also use Sandcastle to produce help files for .
sentences.chinese: 從理論上講，它可以同時使用沙堡幫助文件製作的。

sentences.english: We also built sandcastles on the beach.
sentences.chinese: 我們也在海灘上堆沙堡。

sentences.english: We can swim and make sandcastles there.
sentences.chinese: 我們可以在那裏游泳並堆沙堡。

sentences.english: They need a big tsunami to take out their little sand forts.
sentences.chinese: 來一場海嘯把他們的小沙堡夷爲平地。

sentences.english: The children made a sandcastle on the beach.
sentences.chinese: 小朋友們在海灘上堆沙堡。

sentences.english: The previous release of the Sandcastle provided support for building API references for source codes based on the .
sentences.chinese: 在以前的版本的沙堡建設提供了源代碼的API在。

sentences.english: Look at the kids making a sand castle with their buckets and shovels.
sentences.chinese: 你看有小朋友在用水桶和鏟子玩堆沙堡。

sentences.english: The children are building a sandcastle on the beach.
sentences.chinese: 小孩們通常會在海灘上築沙堡。

sentences.english: David, my husband, loves building sandcastles in the sand.
sentences.chinese: 我的丈夫大衛喜歡用沙子建沙堡。

sentences.english: World's first sand castle hotel at Weymouth beach in the seaside Town of Dorset in the UK.
sentences.chinese: 位於英國多賽特鎮韋茅斯海灘的第一所世界沙堡酒店。

sentences.english: I don't know much about sandcastles.
In the morning they swim, sun-bathe, or build sand-castles.
sentences.chinese: 他們上午游泳，行日光浴或築沙堡玩。

sentences.english: It wasn't very kind of you to shove your little brother's sandcastle down after he had spent so long building it.
sentences.chinese: 你把你弟弟花這麼長時間做的沙堡推倒是不大友好的。

sentences.english: I love building a castle on the beach.
sentences.chinese: 我好喜歡在海灘上堆沙堡。

sentences.english: Your little ones will love building sandcastles here.
sentences.chinese: 小傢伙們一定喜歡在上面堆沙堡。
